description:
This course will guide you step by step on how to successfully start, manage and succeed in your first business venture. These practical and time tested lessons will definitely transform you from a newbie to becoming well informed and successful entrepreneur.

All lessons will be based on simple and practical approaches of running and managing a successful business venture. You will also learn about five of the most vital traits of a successful entrepreneur based on research findings and also based on the instructor's experience and observations.

Therefore if you do not have any knowledge and experience whatsoever in business and entrepreneurship, but would like to start your own business venture very soon, this course is for you.
title: 60 Minutes Business Mastery
